org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.impl.igfs

Interface HadoopIgfsEx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HadoopIgfs
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HadoopIgfsInProc, HadoopIgfsOutProc

    public interface HadoopIgfsEx
extends HadoopIgfs
    Extended IGFS server interface.

    • Method Detail

      • addEventListener

        void addEventListener(HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate delegate,
                      HadoopIgfsStreamEventListener lsnr)
        Adds event listener that will be invoked when connection with server is lost or remote error has occurred. If connection is closed already, callback will be invoked synchronously inside this method.
        Parameters:
        delegate - Stream delegate.
        lsnr - Event listener.

      • removeEventListener

        void removeEventListener(HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate delegate)
        Removes event listener that will be invoked when connection with server is lost or remote error has occurred.
        Parameters:
        delegate - Stream delegate.

      • readData

        IgniteInternalFuture<byte[]> readData(HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate delegate,
                                      long pos,
                                      int len,
                                      @Nullable
                                      byte[] outBuf,
                                      int outOff,
                                      int outLen)
        Asynchronously reads specified amount of bytes from opened input stream.
        Parameters:
        delegate - Stream delegate.
        pos - Position to read from.
        len - Data length to read.
        outBuf - Optional output buffer. If buffer length is less then len, all remaining bytes will be read into new allocated buffer of length {len - outBuf.length} and this buffer will be the result of read future.
        outOff - Output offset.
        outLen - Output length.
        Returns:
        Read data.

      • writeData

        void writeData(HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate delegate,
               byte[] data,
               int off,
               int len)
        throws IOException
        Writes data to the stream with given streamId. This method does not return any future since no response to write request is sent.
        Parameters:
        delegate - Stream delegate.
        data - Data to write.
        off - Offset.
        len - Length.
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed.

      • closeStream

        void closeStream(HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate delegate)
          throws IOException
        Close server stream.
        Parameters:
        delegate - Stream delegate.
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed.

      • flush

        void flush(HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate delegate)
    throws IOException
        Flush output stream.
        Parameters:
        delegate - Stream delegate.
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed.

      • user

        String user()
        The user this Igfs instance works on behalf of.
        Returns:
        the user name.

      • modeResolver

        IgfsModeResolver modeResolver()
                       throws IgniteCheckedException
        Returns:
        Mode resolver.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - On error.
